summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2539 for the improvement of Woodland Park Avenue, from West Green Lake Boulevard to North Seventy-sixth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein, under Ordinance No. 29454, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
